original: 出自《列女傳》，犍為資中人，盛道之妻。盛道聚眾起事，兵敗後，趙媛姜因留下掩護盛道與兒子逃亡，最終受刑而死。
text: From the 'Biography of Women', Qian is a Zizhong, the wife of Sheng Dao. Sheng Dao gathered a crowd to raise an uprising. After the defeat, Zhao Yuanjiang was tortured and died because Sheng Dao and her son escaped because of leaving behind.
